sqlMap.select: SELECT ID, LEVEL, TYPE, PROPERTY1, PROPERTY2, STRE_NUM, STRE_GR, WIN_RATE, FALSE_KEEP_RATE, FALSE_FALL_RATE, FALSE_RUIN_RATE, HOLE_WIN_RATE, SWITCH_FALL_RATE, PROPERTY1_DB, PROPERTY2_DB FROM SYS_STRENGTHEN_APPEND ORDER BY ID ASC
sqlMap.insert:
insert into SYS_STRENGTHEN_APPEND( LEVEL, TYPE, PROPERTY1, PROPERTY2, STRE_NUM, STRE_GR, WIN_RATE, FALSE_KEEP_RATE, FALSE_FALL_RATE, FALSE_RUIN_RATE, HOLE_WIN_RATE, SWITCH_FALL_RATE, PROPERTY1_DB, PROPERTY2_DB ) values( #level#, #type#, #property1#, #property2#, #streNum#, #streGR#, #winRate#, #falseKeepRate#, #falseFallRate#, #falseRuinRate#, #holeWinRate#, #switchFallRate#, #property1_db#, #property2_db# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
sqlMap.update: update SYS_STRENGTHEN_APPEND set LEVEL = #level#, TYPE = #type#, PROPERTY1 = #property1#, PROPERTY2 = #property2#, STRE_NUM = #streNum#, STRE_GR = #streGR#, WIN_RATE = #winRate#, FALSE_KEEP_RATE = #falseKeepRate#, FALSE_FALL_RATE = #falseFallRate#, FALSE_RUIN_RATE = #falseRuinRate#, HOLE_WIN_RATE = #holeWinRate#, SWITCH_FALL_RATE = #switchFallRate#, PROPERTY1_DB = #property1_db#, PROPERTY2_DB = #property2_db# where ID = #id#
